name: live-upwork-job-scraper
title: Live Upwork Job Scraper - URL Parser
description: Simply paste your Upwork search URL and get instant results! Real-time job listings with complete client data, budgets, skills, and competition analysis. Just search on Upwork, copy the URL, and let the scraper do the rest. Perfect for freelancers, agencies, and job market research. Supports all Upwork filters automatically.
